name: Artista - Buffalo Ten Natural Habano - Box Pressed Toro
additionalNotes: They say money isn’t everything and they are right; this blend is priced so low you will question how we even make any money. The answer is: they make cigars, not money. Buffalo TEN is a study in the art of cigar making with three distinct blends to smoke. Natural taste overtones of hardwood notes such as oak and mesquite with undertones of white pepper.
